meanings.definition: A rectangular column that projects slightly from a wall to provide support for an entablature.
meanings.sent1: The pilasters on the building added a classic touch to its design.
meanings.sent2: The architect included pilasters in the structure to enhance its stability.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kids pretended the pilasters were secret levers to a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: The pilasters stood like loyal guardians, silently watching over the entrance.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the pilasters made them stand out as architectural gems.

meanings.definition: A decorative element resembling a column, but attached to a wall.
meanings.sent1: The pilasters were painted in vibrant colors, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent2: The interior designer chose pilasters to give the illusion of grandeur.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the pilasters were perfect scratching posts.
meanings.sent4: The pilasters embraced the room like long-lost friends reunited.
meanings.sent5: The delicate carvings on the pilasters added an elegant charm to the wall.
